document.masterDocTitle: Annotated checklist of the millipede family Chelodesmidae Cook, 1895 from São Paulo state, Brazil (Diplopoda: Polydesmida)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Annotated checklist of the millipede family Chelodesmidae Cook, 1895 from São Paulo state, Brazil (Diplopoda: Polydesmida)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Leptodesmus paulistus Brölemann, 1902a: 59
, Figs. 20-29 (Male holotype , MZSP, from
Alto da Serra
(=
Serra de Paranapiacaba
), Santo André , 46°18’35.77”W ; 23°46’54.82”S , São Paulo , Brazil );
Brölemann, 1909: 71
.
